One way to do this is to subclass the Suite runner and pass the array of cl=
asses to the Suite constructor. How you generate that array from the classe=
s available on the classpath is not something JUnit provides special help w=
ith, but you can look at the Reflections project to help you with that:

ht=
tp://code.google.com/p/reflections/

I haven't tried categories with the su=
b-classing method, but I would be surprised if it didn't work.
